title: cenni malai vAsanaiyE
sahitya:
cenni malai vAsanaiyE sEvitt-uivEn nAn ennidaya nEsanAi irundu varak-kOri


anupallavi

  tannai vaNanginOrait-tayangAmal aNaiyum vanna mayilOn avan ponnaDi tanaip-pOTri


caraNam    annai pOl anbarai Adarittu varuvOn tannai nambinOrait-tAngit-tuNai purivOn
innalurum aDiyArin iDarinait-tuDaippOn panniru karattAlum pAnguDan aNaippOn
